headline: AIG appoints CEO for International Commercial Insurance
summary: Adam Clifford will oversee underwriting, distribution and business teams in the UK and Europe, Asia-Pacific, MEA and Latin America.

raw.headline: AIG appoints CEO for International Commercial Insurance
raw.summary: Adam Clifford will oversee underwriting, distribution and business teams in the UK and Europe, Asia-Pacific, MEA and Latin America.

headline: Is AIG’s (AIG) New International Leadership Bench Quietly Reframing Its Global Profitability Playbook?
summary: American International Group recently announced that Adam Clifford will become CEO of International Commercial Insurance and Scott Leney will serve as Regional President for Asia Pacific, while the Board has updated its by-laws to align with Delaware law and refine shareholder meeting and nomination rules. These leadership moves bring Everest Insurance veterans and former AIG and Marsh McLennan leaders into key international roles, potentially reshaping how AIG runs its global commercial...
